TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Maia, title = Maia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maia} }

S.FORM: alang Maia (Mangacun, Mangacun, 瑪雅部落) ga niya mki sku Takaw Si atu Namasya Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 218 buwan, 788 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96% kyan ku 757 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4% kyan ku 31 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 60%, Paywan 5%, Tayan 3%, Amis 1%, Cou 10%, Hla'aluwa 7%, Kanakanabu 9%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Maia hya' ga Nangnisalu. tay mkraya' na Maia hya' ga Takanua. rekisi kayal qalang ru cingay qalax qu kayal nya'. kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh tuqi qsya' ki rrhzyal giway rgrgyax kwara' qalang. 'llaw balay ktan qu qalang myan. baqun tmnga' kwara' rgryax nya'. tuqi 'san ungat kisya' nya'. "basu'" qu spzyang glgang nha qalang musa' ana inu'.

alang Maia (Mangacon, Mangacon, 瑪雅部落) ga niya mki sko Takaw Si ato Namasya Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 218 bowan, 788 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 96% kyan ko 757 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 4% kyan ko 31 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 60%, Paywan 5%, Tayan 3%, Amis 1%, Coo 10%, Hla'alowa 7%, Kanakanabo 9%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Maia hya' ga Nangnisalo. tay mkraya' na Maia hya' ga Takanoa. rekisi kayal qalang ro cingay qalax qo kayal nya'. kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh toqi qsya' ki rrhzyal giway rgrgyax kwara' qalang. 'llaw balay ktan qo qalang myan. baqon tmnga' kwara' rgryax nya'. toqi 'san ongat kisya' nya'. "baso'" qo spzyang glgang nha qalang mosa' ana ino'.
